name: Tanks
overview: Tanks is an arcade game. The place of action is a future where the computer took control of the machines. The player (or players) controlling two tanks must defeat an army guided by the computer. On the game board outside enemy units the player will find a lot of useful and dangerous items such as extra fuel, extra weapons, mines, missiles reflective wall. To move to the next stage player must destroy appropriate amount enemy vehicles. Players can interact or fight with each other.
